name: PickBetter - AI Food Scanner
description: A vibrant, gamified food health scanner that evaluates food items based on your personal health profile using Gemini AI.  I am building "PickBetter," an AI-powered nutrition analysis app. The backend is FastAPI. I need a comprehensive User Profile Setup & Edit section. This profile will eventually feed into an FSSAI-based scoring engine, so the data structure must be precise.
